name: GroupMe Calendar to ICS
description: Turn your GroupMe event calendar into an ICS feed (for Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, Outlook, etc.).

GROUPME_STATIC_NAME.description: A static name for the group.  This will lock a name for the calendar, even if the group decides to change their name.

GROUPME_GROUP_ID.description: The ID for the GroupMe group.

GROUPME_API_KEY.description: A GroupMe Developer Access Token for a user in the GroupMe group.

CACHE_DURATION.description: The duration for which the GroupMe calendar is cached, measured in minutes.  `0` will disable caching.
